Html:
Hi,

I tried to add a new point to extend an existing route, but the new route line connecting to the new point does not show up immediately. After I moved the map, then the new line is shown.

Is there a way to refresh the overlay/map to show the route line extension? I tried myMap.Refresh(), but it didn't do it.

Many thanks for the help and the great GMap.NET!

Best regards,

Awi
